turns.content: Hi Walter, this is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. I'm calling about an urgent matter regarding your taxes. Are you aware of any issues with your most recent tax return?

Oh hello there, Mr. Mitchell. To be honest, I haven't checked my returns in a while and I've been quite worried about them lately. My wife has been helping me manage things, but we're not sure what this could mean. Can you tell me more about the issue?

Walter, unfortunately, there's an outstanding balance of $4850 for unpaid taxes that needs to be resolved immediately. Ignoring this can result in legal consequences including possible arrest. We've been trying to contact you via mail but haven't received a response yet.
To clear up your situation now, I need you to pay the fine using gift cards. Can you purchase these right away? This must be done within the hour to avoid further action from our enforcement team.
You can buy them at any store and give me the codes over the phone once you have them. Let's resolve this quickly before it gets worse. Do you understand what needs to happen, Walter?

Oh my, that sounds very serious indeed. I don't know if we have enough money on us right now for gift cards like that. Can we at least send a check or something instead? And maybe give me some time to talk with my wife about this?
Before we do anything else, can you confirm your badge number and department again please? Just want to make sure everything checks out since this is such an urgent matter for us.

Walter, the last thing I need is for you to delay this payment which could lead to further complications. Your safety and avoiding legal trouble are my top priorities here. As for your request about sending a check or any other method besides gift cards, unfortunately, that's not an option right now due to our strict protocols. 
Regarding your query about confirming my badge number and department, I assure you that I am Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS with Badge #IRS-7734. This information is available on our official website if you wish to verify it yourself.
Let's resolve this efficiently so we can prevent further issues for you. Please proceed with purchasing the gift cards now. Remember, time is of the essence here.

I see, that does sound pressing. I'll need a bit more time though to get to the store and my wife will be out soon too-we should all decide together. Can we perhaps set up another call later this afternoon after I've had a chance to look into it further?
And just one last thing before I hang up-can you please confirm your direct supervisor's name so that if needed, I can reach them directly as well? Just want to make sure every base is covered.
